channel.title: Rojhat Sinan Balka
channel.description: Recent content on Rojhat Sinan Balka

item.description: Rojhat Sinan Balka | Software Engineer rojbalka@gmail.com | https://linkedin.com/in/roj | https://github.com/rosiba | Istanbul, Turkey Summary Self-taught software engineer with expertise in backend development of Go microservices and gRPC communication. Experience ERP Developer Medipol Health Group (2024-Present) Wrote Oracle SQL queries to generate financial reports. Used Oracle OTBI to generate invetory management analysis. Lead Software Engineer Symphony (2022-2023) Led 6 person team to design, develop and deliver software. Acted as a software architect of client projects.
